建議: 一個主力+一個輔助 major>兩個主力major(太chur)>兩個輔助major
亦有人一個主力major+ 任玩其他任何major courses
又或者:1Soft skill major+ 1Hard skill major


Acct: 一個主力major 好易讀好grade, 派好多A range, 考之前比心機計數做exercise就得, 部份courses例如law需要背書, 但acct入面唔少有acct sense(both FA and MA)既人, 可以走哂堂溫幾日都屈你機。Faculty冇咩support, 得個Acct3880搵人宣傳下big4,但實際冇咩用, 唔似shity咁你肯做就會幫你搵intern。Acct絕對唔係搵食科, 但起碼唔係乞食科, big4好stable, 如果你捱到的話。Career方面最多係big4 audit同tax big4起薪點低得14K, peak season 晚晚可以凌晨12點後先走得, 可以稱得上非人生活, 超過9成人捱完3年拎牌就跳去其他公司,亦有好多一年已經頂唔順quit game,捱到manager位就可能有4,50K。當然仲有其他出路, 例如compliance, company secretary。Big4性價比低但門檻唔高, 認真讀實有間請你, 想捱就入黎Acct。 major acct去exchange好有可能defer, curriculum好唔flexible, 多courses要讀, 去big4做intern會發覺得科大未教過audit同tax(final year先讀), 有d大學year2,3 已經讀左, 而你自己就弱弱智智咩都唔識。


推介course: 每一個都要讀架la 硬食la 369


Fina: 另一個主力major 好受歡迎(好似要B+先入得, 不過唔代表好讀) 好多mainland同神人, 競爭大，我廢實話爛grade 。黎緊fina由4cre變3cre, 變相要讀多個elective, 但讀d野黎黎去去都係果d, 多assumption, 個人認為唔太practical, 不過黎緊會多d practical course, 而且faculty想將佢推上半神科. 課程都ok多project, 例如3104要用4隻真stock做portfolio management, 多參與可以訓練technical skills. Faculty間唔中會refer下d intern jobs, 同叫人聽下d finance-related talks. Career方面普通bba major入面人工最高, 好似係。Career prospect方面應該ok 多ibank, banking同mt。呢科人工高係本身班人勁, 唔代表讀完finance就會對financial market 有realistic既認知, 有d垃圾讀完finance都可以完全唔識finance, 要靠自己生活中explore(睇新聞), 科大d finance courses其實唔太realistic。可能亦有人誤解讀完finance就可以輕鬆入銀行mt, 但finance本質係重technical skills, soft skills上冇乜幫助, 而soft skills 往往由輔助major train出黎 (that’s why qfin神人 高度推介F&Mark)


主觀感受: 唔好major finance, and hi fina lm


推介course:
1.FINA 3304(法國婆) 狼清高度推介
2.古清高度推介鬼佬鬼婆prof
3.FINA 3104(Entela夠practical)


避得就避:
FINA 3204 難撚到仆街 XX(
大陸班finance prof(完全唔入流)
mk lai(原因同上)


Mark:

Mgmt: 一個輔助型major, 讀management 第一件事一定係俾人問其實係讀咩, 咁mgmt 就有好多firmwide 同personal ge issue 都可以讀ge ,有strategy and consulting到有leadership有hrm(最低賤)有decision making 連negotiation 都有, 咁唔洗擔心要揀D咩因為差唔多都要全部讀曬(leadership/hrm 揀1,judgment/negotiation 揀1, corporate strategy/entrepreneurship 揀1之後再揀3個elective(eg. 19csr ) 有好多好多project(每科都有)如果想識人識女就perfect池, 好典型女多男小考試靠背書ge major, 有唔小case study/essay要做, work load 唔算大因為D 嘢唔算難, 不過冇得抄因為好多都係reflection on yourself. Career 方面冇咩direct related ge 工(除左hr),mt就算la 有大把人爭 有好多人會搭marketing ( 因為一樣冇數計)




主觀感受:好多野學,幾多Interaction ge major, 有好多realistic 小小ge 嘢會接觸到, 不過同學質數參差, 有D 好勁有D好廢, 揀groupmate 要小心


推介course:
MGMT 4250 (management consulting): 幫一間startup (佢俾) 去solve real business problem, 要見client, 成個course 做一個project( 50%,50%parti) , 每堂都要present 進度同埋要用佢俾ge consulting framework 去做, 有好多exchange 會take 同埋都好認真做, 最顛果陣要日日開會度solution 同做research, 好chur, but rewarding
MGMT 3140 (negotiation): 同course name 一樣, 每一個星期negotiate 一次, 另外一堂就做debriefing, 講數真係幾好玩, 同埋debriefing 都教到你好多嘢, 教果個係steven nason, 有幾勁唔洗講, 總之上堂一定唔會悶同埋都幾多exchange, 學英文一流!
MGMT 3130(Judgment and decision making): 首先: carman 真係好靚女 <3, 呢科係用psycho ge 角度去講人ge bias and error, 有D 似OB, 堂堂都會有好多例子去back up 個theory, D 嘢唔難同埋考試係open book MC+ SQ, 所以都算係hing sung 4 cred course


避得就避: 所有leadership course - 因為淨係教theory 冇得好practical 咁學, 所以上左7 cred(1120+3120)除左識分lee 個世界有D 咩leadership 之外冇嘢學過




OM:


IS: 呢2年多左人揀, Acct同IS都係個唔錯既combination, 電腦勁識寫apps可以揀, 識人讀acct&IS 入到ibank IT team(risk) IS係輔助Major,如果本身對Programming 同電腦有勁大興趣，建議直接揀RMBI / ECOF/ QFIN，IS教既野唔專，只係皮毛野，最有用應該係IS3230，會教你點樣用Excel VBA。其他果幾個Course，作用不大。
如果想做IT Auditor，IS都係一個唔錯既選擇，讀哂iSOM4100同4300可以去考牌，入Big 4 做IT Auditor。


ECON: ECON大部分course嘅workload都唔太重 Problem set比較多 得少量course有project/case 不過再有少量course要寫paper 我淨係寫過一份就已經畢到業 然後就考midterm 考final ECON maj必須要寫過paper去pass ECON4670 最容易pass ECON4670嘅course係ECON4474 (雷神鼎鳴教嘅) ECON course grade比較緊 通常得20% A range 個別prof唔派A+ 再加個頂通常有好多勁人 糊里糊塗入黎而冇心/冇興趣認真讀 應該可以全C range 同埋個個讀親3334就叫晒救命 第一 一定係spring sem讀 因為fall sem會pre reg QF 第二 一定要操數 Luxun間中會出課後題目 第三 一定要記得做功課 (總分差幾分就一個grade) 其實3334課程唔難 不過一定要熟晒所有野先可以好grade 然後雖然luxun都幾爛grade, 但係我fall sem讀有B+ (midterm below mean) P.S. Local fresh grad入BB IBD都應該真係唔止2個 多係唔多 不過唔係冇 But the fact is 通常讀得econ, GPA都唔會夠好入ibank


最後, 其實讀咩major都唔緊要, 到最後都係睇你先自己。建議year1做下細firm intern/ 去下summer exchange/ 參加case comp/做下corporation project, 參加唔同課外活動enrich張cv。Year2 可以試報professional firm, 同你major 有關既intern, 通常年頭就開始報, 亦有ibank, banking係fall sem 已經要報哂, 到year3先黎做intern就為時而晚 (你張CV空白)。BBA過3真係standard黎, 連3都唔過唔該比心機讀書, 否則好多firm都唔夠資格報, banking MT, big4 advisory standard3.3




Grade 固然仲要,但係就快year 3 ge 你唔應該再on99 咁去take cc 屈grade( 除非未讀完), 唔好曬左D cred 佢, 讀多D 唔同ge business course 擴闊自己個mindset

學科Highlight:

1. 三大QFIN中排名第一：係就業同升Master都係，超過50%同學入到ibank （遠高於其他學科如 Gbus)，Master Offer 亦都係頂尖學校，如：Princeston MFin

2. Program 人數少，本身班人成績都好好，超過70% First Hon，另外圈子內既人好熟，Alumni Support 強

3. 就業前景明朗，平均月入4萬以上

4. Case Competition Champions 全港各學系第一，Given that 本身學生數目只係其他program既一半

5. 學系本身自由度大，可以好容易做自己想做自己既野又唔洗Defer
例如：好多同學都只係讀左三年半就Grad；亦都有人Self-apply 去Harvard Visiting 一年

When an ideal gas is allowed to expand isothermally from volume V1 to a larger
volume V2, the gas does an amount of work equal to W12.
If the same ideal gas is allowed to expand adiabatically from volume V1 to a larger
volume V2, the gas does an amount of work that is
A. equal to W12.
B. less than W12.
C. greater than W12.
D. either A., B., or C., depending on the ratio of V2 to V1.

9. What are the hypotheses the researcher wishes to test?
A) H0:  = 0 versus Ha:  > 0, where  = the mean of the differences in cholesterol levels
(Husband – Wife) for all couples without cholesterol problems.
B) H0: p = ½ versus Ha: p ≠ ½, where p = the proportion of cholesterol levels of the
husband that are higher than those of the wife.
C) H0: p = ½ versus Ha: p < ½, where p = the proportion of cholesterol levels of the
husband that are higher than those of the wife.
D) H0: population median = 0 versus Ha: population median > 0, where the differences for
which the median is calculated are measured as Husband – Wife.
Answer: D

佢地個 announcement 係咁既:
==============================================
Dear COMP 2011 students,

We are very disappointed to find out many cheating cases in PA3. Again, as we have clearly written on our course website under "Honor Code" that regardless of whether one copied one's assignment from others or let others copy assignment from him/her, both cases are considered plagiarism.

The three instructors agree, after a long discussion, to give the cheaters one more chance to confess their wrongdoing. If you committed plagiarism on PA3 and confess

*** before tomorrow noon (Dec 14th, Wednesday) ***

by email or by going to see your TA Wallace, we will reduce your penalty by half to 2.5% of the final grade and your cheating cases will not be reported to the department; your PA3 will still get zero mark though. If we don't hear from the cheaters before tomorrow noon, we'll send out the penalty notice to those we find, and the penalty will be zero mark on PA3 plus 5% penalty on the final grade, and we reserve the right to report your case to the department.

Let me warn the cheaters that we believe we have very strong evidence on your cases, and if you come to appeal and tell more lies about your case, we'll treat that as a further breach of the University's Academic Integrity policy, and we'll impose additional penalty: the penalty will be an additional 10% off from the total mark of COMP 2011 (that is a total of 5% + 10% = 15%) and your cheating case will be reported to the department which, in turn, may report to the University. The result will be a cheating record on your transcript until you graduate. (Please read http://www.ust.hk/vpaao/integrity/ for more details about University's commitment on upholding academic integrity and punishment on breaching academic integrity.)

On the other hand, if you have problem with your study, please approach your instructor or our TAs as soon as possible so that we may try to help you.

Please understand that the cheating cases also include plagiarizing only part of the assignment. And we don't really care about who is copying, who is being copied. They are both considered cheating
==============================================

Overall建議:
1. 一個主力+一個輔助 major>兩個主力major(太chur)>兩個輔助major
2. 1 主力major+ 任玩其他任何major courses

Professional Accountancy (主力major)
Grade:
好易讀好grade, 派好多A range, 考之前比心機計數做exercise就得, 部份courses例如law需要背書, 但acct入面唔少有acct sense(both FA and MA)既人, 可以走哂堂溫幾日都屈你機。

Career support:
Faculty冇咩support, 得個Acct3880搵人宣傳下big4,但實際冇咩用, 唔似shity咁你肯做就會幫你搵intern。Acct絕對唔係搵食科, 但起碼唔係乞食科, big4好stable, 如果你捱到的話。Career方面最多係big4 audit同tax big4起薪點低得14K, peak season 晚晚可以凌晨12點後先走得, 可以稱得上非人生活, 超過9成人捱完3年拎牌就跳去其他公司,亦有好多一年已經頂唔順quit game,捱到manager位就可能有4,50K。當然仲有其他出路, 例如compliance, company secretary。Big4性價比低但門檻唔高, 認真讀實有間請你, 想捱就入黎Acct。 major acct去exchange好有可能defer, curriculum好唔flexible, 多courses要讀, 去big4做intern會發覺得科大未教過audit同tax(final year先讀), 有d大學year2,3 已經讀左, 而你自己就弱弱智智咩都唔識。

推介course: 全部required

Finance主力major 好受歡迎(好似要B+先入得, 不過唔代表好讀)

Grade:
好多mainland同神人, 競爭大，我廢實話爛grade 。黎緊fina由4cre變3cre, 變相要讀多個elective, 但讀d野黎黎去去都係果d, 多assumption, 個人認為唔太practical, 不過黎緊會多d practical course, 而且faculty想將佢推上半神科. 課程都ok多project, 例如3104要用4隻真stock做portfolio management, 多參與可以訓練technical skills.

Career support:
Faculty間唔中會refer下d intern jobs, 同叫人聽下d finance-related talks. Career方面普通bba major入面人工最高, 好似係。Career prospect方面應該ok 多ibank, banking同mt。呢科人工高係本身班人勁, 唔代表讀完finance就會對financial market 有realistic既認知, 有d垃圾讀完finance都可以完全唔識finance, 要靠自己生活中explore(睇新聞), 科大d finance courses其實唔太realistic。可能亦有人誤解讀完finance就可以輕鬆入銀行mt, 但finance本質係重technical skills, soft skills上冇乜幫助, 而soft skills 往往由輔助major train出黎 (that’s why qfin神人 高度推介F&Mark)

主觀感受: 唔好major finance, and hi fina lm

推介course:
1.FINA 3304(法國婆) 狼清高度推介
2.古清高度推介鬼佬鬼婆prof
3.FINA 3104(Entela夠practical)

避得就避:
FINA 3204 難撚到仆街 XX(
大陸班finance prof(完全唔入流)
mk lai(原因同上)
法國婆正紅著眼

Management 輔助型major

內容:
讀management 第一件事一定係俾人問其實係讀咩, 咁mgmt 就有好多firmwide 同personal ge issue 都可以讀ge ,有strategy and consulting到有leadership有hrm(最低賤)有decision making 連negotiation 都有, 咁唔洗擔心要揀D咩因為差唔多都要全部讀曬(leadership/hrm 揀1,judgment/negotiation 揀1, corporate strategy/entrepreneurship 揀1之後再揀3個elective(eg. 19csr ) 有好多好多project(每科都有)如果想識人識女就perfect池, 好典型女多男小考試靠背書ge major, 有唔小case study/essay要做, work load 唔算大因為D 嘢唔算難, 不過冇得抄因為好多都係reflection on yourself.

Career
方面冇咩direct related ge 工(除左hr),mt就算la 有大把人爭 有好多人會搭marketing ( 因為一樣冇數計)

主觀感受:好多野學,幾多Interaction ge major, 有好多realistic 小小ge 嘢會接觸到, 不過同學質數參差, 有D 好勁有D好廢, 揀groupmate 要小心

推介course:
MGMT 4250 (management consulting): 幫一間startup (佢俾) 去solve real business problem, 要見client, 成個course 做一個project( 50%,50%parti) , 每堂都要present 進度同埋要用佢俾ge consulting framework 去做, 有好多exchange 會take 同埋都好認真做, 最顛果陣要日日開會度solution 同做research, 好chur, but rewarding

MGMT 3140 (negotiation): 同course name 一樣, 每一個星期negotiate 一次, 另外一堂就做debriefing, 講數真係幾好玩, 同埋debriefing 都教到你好多嘢, 教果個係steven nason, 有幾勁唔洗講, 總之上堂一定唔會悶同埋都幾多exchange, 學英文一流!

MGMT 3130(Judgment and decision making): 首先: carman 真係好靚女 <3, 呢科係用psycho ge 角度去講人ge bias and error, 有D 似OB, 堂堂都會有好多例子去back up 個theory, D 嘢唔難同埋考試係open book MC+ SQ, 所以都算係hing sung 4 cred course


避得就避:
所有leadership course - 因為淨係教theory 冇得好practical 咁學, 所以上左7 cred(1120+3120)除左識分lee 個世界有D 咩leadership 之外冇嘢學過

Information System 呢2年多左人揀，Acct同IS都係個唔錯既combination

內容
電腦勁識寫apps可以揀, 識人讀acct&IS 入到ibank IT team(risk) IS係輔助Major,如果本身對Programming 同電腦有勁大興趣，建議直接揀RMBI / ECOF/ QFIN，IS教既野唔專，只係皮毛野，

推界course:
最有用應該係IS3230，會教你點樣用Excel VBA。其他果幾個Course，作用不大。

如果想做IT Auditor，IS都係一個唔錯既選擇，讀哂iSOM4100同4300可以去考牌，入Big 4 做IT Auditor。

Economics

內容
ECON大部分course嘅workload都唔太重 Problem set比較多 得少量course有project/case 不過再有少量course要寫paper 我淨係寫過一份就已經畢到業 然後就考midterm 考final ECON maj必須要寫過paper去pass ECON4670 最容易pass ECON4670嘅course係ECON4474 (雷神鼎鳴教嘅)

Grade:
ECON course grade比較緊 通常得20% A range 個別prof唔派A+ 再加個頂通常有好多勁人 糊里糊塗入黎而冇心/冇興趣認真讀 應該可以全C range 同埋個個讀親3334就叫晒救命


ECON3334攻略
一定係spring sem讀 因為fall sem會pre reg QF
一定要操數 Luxun間中會出課後題目
一定要記得做功課 (總分差幾分就一個grade) 其實3334課程唔難 不過一定要熟晒所有野先可以好grade 然後雖然luxun都幾爛grade, 但係我fall sem讀有B+ (midterm below mean)

P.S. Local fresh grad入BB IBD都應該真係唔止2個 多係唔多 不過唔係冇 But the fact is 通常讀得econ, GPA都唔會夠好入ibank

OM講嘅有好多 Business Stat, Quality control, Revenue Control, Enterprise Resource Management, Supply Chain, Data Mining等等 全部都可以開course詳講
OM一定唔係只有Case Study 但當然Case Study可以引伸到唔同範疇
你可以話都幾多數計下 咁冇計而家所有野都能夠quantify
有機會學下點將Process變得更efficient 點控制好成本

技術上好似Excel咁點善用去做Business Application 3710好似會教(我未讀)

最記得個prof話要有high quality必先剔除一啲標榜high quality 嘅slogan/poster咁 暗串科大成日話自己第一

其中會有data mining(基本野) 同埋另一個decision Analytics 只要另外讀左呢6cre就有多句野喺你transcript
其實IS同OM都頗注重未來應該點做 靠分析historical data 去瞭解點樣優化現有嘅野
我會覺得ISOM屬於對一間公司係有value added嘅科
至於其他科好似冇咁著重呢方面啦我覺得
